> to rescue their souls from death,  
> and to keep them alive in famine.

:::

> Thus says the Lord:  
> Let whoever is thirsty come to me and drink.  
> Streams of living water will flow  
> from within the one who believes in me.

### Notes
:::

* The **Sacred Heart of Jesus** is celebrated on the nineteenth day after
Pentecost, on a Friday. It may, at the discretion of a diocese or local pastor, be transferred or celebrated on the weekend immediately following, such as for parishes named after or devoted to the Sacred Heart.
